text: Marvel Comics is an American comic book company dating to 1961. This is a list of the publications it has released in its history under the "Marvel Comics" imprint. The list does not include collected editions; trade paperbacks; digital comics; free, promotional giveaways; sketchbooks; poster books or magazines, nor does it include series published by other Marvel imprints such as Epic, Icon or Star. It also does not include titles published by Marvel's pre-1961 predecessors Timely Comics and Atlas Comics. *List of Marvel Comics publications (A) *List of Marvel Comics publications (B–C) *List of Marvel Comics publications (D–G) *List of Marvel Comics publications (H–L) *List of Marvel Comics publications (M) *List of Marvel Comics publications (N–R) *List of Marvel Comics publications (T–V)
